job_tasks.phrase: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in defining the direction and scope of technology development in alignment with the company's strategic goals and the needs of different teams.

job_tasks.phrase: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
job_tasks.justification: This clearly describes the development and deployment of software, specifically 'rendering technology' and 'end-user software'.

job_tasks.phrase: Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
job_tasks.justification: This involves architectural decisions and technology selection, which are core to software development and engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration with development teams to define technical strategies and approaches for software.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing specific tools and automation for users (artists), which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the build, test, and deploy cycle, which are key MLOps activities for software and pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly.
job_tasks.justification: While documenting and training are support functions, the 'implement directly' part after picking up enhancements implies continued software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams
Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams
define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture
develop the tools and automation they need
define the future architecture of our technology platform
pick up enhancements and implement directly

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software development, pipeline management, and collaboration with artistic and technical teams. There is no mention of Generative AI, LLMs, diffusion models, or related core concepts that would align with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile. It appears to be a role focused on rendering technology and creative tooling, not AI.
